name: Gerry V. Dozier
content: Gerry Dozier, Ph.D. Gerry Vernon Dozier, PhD Professor Computer Science and Software Engineering 3101H Shelby Center Auburn University Auburn, AL 36849 E-Mail: gvdozier at auburn dot e d u Phone (334) 844-8834 RESEARCH AREAS: Artificial Intelligence & Identity Science SPECIALTIES: Cyberidentity Protection & Privacy Genetic & Evolutionary Computation Adversarial Machine Learning Adversarial Authorship Vita Short Long Courses COMP-7976: Computational Intelligence & Adversarial Machine Learning Research Artificial Intelligence & Identity Research (AI2R) Lab Author Cyber Analysis & Advisement Tool (AuthorCAAT) Malware Cyber Analysis & Advisement Tool (MalwareCAAT) Artificial Intelligence & Identity Research Lab | CSSE | Samuel Ginn College of Engineering | Auburn University
